name: Arch High
description:
New project woo! It's being created in RPG Maker VM It's a free roam/Open Sand box adult themed game.

Its called Arch High

The story: You are a freshmen named Sarah Walwinski who just moved to town with your family. That where you come in make it your own!

Currently In play: Quest, Stats Progression, Karam, and Lust, almost everything can be examined used taken... ect Home 99% Arch Town 20%

Currently planed: H-Scences... with pictures!
More Quest
More Areas
More Npcs
More Stats sensitive Interactions
and more!

In the end is where you can do what you want how you want... Want to be a fishman? Great! Want to be a doctor? SURE! Want to be very naughty? DUH! Want to buy crops low and travel to sell high? YEP! Want to just be a good girl go to school and learn? Idk why but yeah! Wana be a jerk? Lower that karma!
Want to be a slave... or own slaves? Yes sirre

Planned tags: Exibitionism, Bestiality, Incest, Rape, Consenual sex, BDSM, Watersports, Slavery... more and more...
